node.title: Top Aboriginal barrister Tony McAvoy SC expected to become NT Acting Treaty Commissioner
node.alt: Indigenous lawyer Tony McAvoy SC in his office, with a wig on his desk, surrounded by legal books.
node.description: Australia's most senior Aboriginal barrister Tony McAvoy SC is expected to be appointed to the role of Northern Territory Acting Treaty Commissioner.
node.content:
["Australia's most senior Aboriginal barrister Tony McAvoy SC is today expected to be appointed to the role of Acting Treaty Commissioner in the Northern Territory.", "The role has been vacant since the middle of the year when former Australian of the Year Mick Dodson resigned and apologised following an allegation he verbally abused a woman.", "NT Treaty Minister Selena Uibo last night confirmed Professor Dodson's replacement would be officially sworn in on Wednesday.", "The ABC understands Mr McAvoy was the successful candidate, but Ms Uibo would not disclose who had\u00a0been selected for the role.", "\"We're very excited, we'll be looking to have the endorsement and the appointment from her honour, the Administrator Vicki O'Halloran, to go through that process,\" Ms Uibo said.", "Mr McAvoy, a Wirdi man from central Queensland, was Australia's first Indigenous Senior Counsel and is co-chair of the Indigenous Legal Issues Committee of the Law Council of Australia.", "He was the co-counsel assisting the Royal Commission into Youth Detention in the Northern Territory in 2016 and 2017.", "He also has extensive experience providing legal advice to jurisdictions on treaty matters, including negotiations in Victoria, Queensland and South Australia.", "The NT government has been without a Treaty Commissioner since June 11.", "", "
Ms Uibo welcomed the appointment, and said treaty negotiations were ongoing.(ABC News: Laetitia Lemke)
", "
Treaty process 'has continued': Minister
", "Ms Uibo confirmed the NT's four Aboriginal land councils had given their endorsement for the new Acting Commissioner.", "\"It has been several months, and I know that people across the Territory have been very interested in the work that the Treaty Commission has been doing,\" Ms Uibo said.", "\"The great thing is the work has continued, so, despite the resignation of the Treaty Commissioner in June this year, the Treaty Commission staff and the Deputy Treaty Commissioner have continued the work and the process that they've been doing.\"", "She said the new appointee was expected to issue a final report to the government in March next year on the best path forward for a future treaty or treaties.", "The new appointee is expected to be in the role for up to six months.", "Ms Uibo conceded the resignation of Professor Dodson was a \"very difficult and very upsetting event for a lot of people, in terms of the aspirations that people have linked with the Treaty Commission and the office\".", "\"I know that the Treaty Commission staff have done a huge amount of work that is very commendable in the process of not having an appointed Treaty Commissioner in the past few months,\" she said.", "Ms Uibo said it was difficult to answer questions about when Territorians would likely see a treaty or treaties, but added she was \"realistic\" that it was a vision that remained years away."]
